instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00239: What is 820-00239? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00239</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> ppbus short
threads.message:
Arrived with liquid damage mainly in speaker section of the board.

After replacing everything board was working fine. Stopped turning on again. 2.2 ohms on <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL>

L7430/20  are both also 2.2 ohms. Does this automatically mean bad <CHIP>U7430</CHIP>/20?

Similar board with different issue also reads 2.2ohms on L7430/20 but much higher ohms on <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL>

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00239</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> ppbus short
threads.message:
Check exact ohm resistance between <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> and L7420/30.
Two values possible, close to 0 (zero), or 4-5 ohms; then guess what happens...
